data.title: Apart-Hotel Zurich Airport
data.meta_description: Welcome to Apart-Hotel Zurich Airport Official Site. Our airport hotel is located near Zurich old town and the business district. Book online now!
data.text:
Discover quality hotel rooms & apartments in Zurich at Apart-Hotel Zurich Airport. Our Apart-hotel is just 5 minutes from Zurich’s international airport and 15 minutes from downtown with its popular lakeside promenade, the old town and many cultural attractions.

Direct access to the highway, the proximity to public transportation, the business district, the trade show venue and to the Hallenstadion make the Apart-Hotel Zurich Airport an attractive and convenient starting point for business and leisure trips as well as for extended stays and stopovers.

Look forward to a relaxing stay in one of the 67 stylish, larger than average and comfortably furnished rooms & apartments. A few rooms feature a separate living room and work area as well as a balcony.

You can enjoy a full American Breakfast Buffet for 25.00 CHF per person or a French Breakfast (coffee/ tea, juice, croissant) for 15 CHF per person at the close by Hilton Zurich Airport.

Complimentary Wi-Fi Internet access is available throughout this hotel in Zurich, and there is also a web corner station, business travelers can easily work in the lobby after check-out until they leave to the nearby airport. Moreover, they also enjoy free access to the fitness center with sauna, steam bath and relaxing room in the adjacent Hilton Zurich Airport.

Stay in shape and use the 10 km running track behind the hotel that offers a view of the Swiss Alps. In addition, we provide an airport shuttle service (Hilton Shuttle) and 40 parking spaces. (Fees apply)

​

We are delighted to offer a dedicated shuttle service in between Zurich Airport and the hotel. Once you have arrived at the airport, simply follow signs for "Hotelbus" in order to be guided towards the shuttle pick-up location outside of Arrivals 1. The transfer from the airport towards the hotel will be complimentary for all guests. When using the shuttle going to the airport, a fee of CHF 7.00 per person will apply. Tickets must be purchased at the front desk before using the shuttle from the hotel towards the airport.

Please note:

The Check-in is conducted at the close by Hilton Zurich Airport.
